item.title: Java Gson Read JSON File using JsonReader
item.description: In this Java Gson tutorial we learn how to use the com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader class of Gson library to read JSON file content. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Gson to the Java project To use the Gson library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation group: 'com.google.code.gson', name: 'gson', version: '2.8.7' To use the Gson library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
